mapper.select:
select regdate.day, nvl(sum(s.cnt), 0) as s_cnt, nvl(sum(u.cnt), 0) as u_cnt, nvl(sum(r.cnt), 0) as r_cnt from
(select trunc(space_request_date) regdate, count(*) cnt from space where trunc(space_request_date)>= trunc(sysdate)-7 and trunc(sysdate)>trunc(space_request_date) group by trunc(space_request_date)) s, (select trunc(user_reg_date) regdate, count(*) cnt from user_info where trunc(user_reg_date)>= trunc(sysdate)-7 and trunc(sysdate)>trunc(user_reg_date) group by trunc(user_reg_date)) u, (select trunc(reserver_pay_day) regdate, count(*) cnt from reservation where trunc(reserver_pay_day)>= trunc(sysdate)-7 and trunc(sysdate)>trunc(reserver_pay_day) group by trunc(reserver_pay_day)) r, (select trunc(sysdate - level) day from dual connect by level <= 7) regdate where regdate.day = s.regdate(+) and regdate.day = u.regdate(+) and regdate.day = r.regdate(+)
group by regdate.day order by regdate.day
